S063E.DECK.  063. SURVEY NUMBER
S063E.BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.

S063E.Q1. WHAT IS YOUR ARMY RANK OR GRAD?  1. PRIVATE 2. PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 3. TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE OR CORPORAL 4. TECHNICIAN 4TH GRADE OR SERGEANT 5. TECHNICIAN 3RD GRADE OR STAFF SERGEANT 6. TECHNICAL SERGEANT 7. MASTER SERGEANT OR FIRST SERGEANT 0. NO ANSWER
S063E.Q2. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDA?  01. 18 YEARS OR YOUNGER 02. 19 YEARS 03. 20 04. 21 05. 22 06. 23 07. 24 08. 25 09. 26-29 YEARS 10. 30-34 YEARS 11. 35 YEARS AND OVER 00. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q3. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOO?  1. LESS THAN 6TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 6TH GRADE 3. FINISHED 7TH GRADE 4. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 5. SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT FINISH 6. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 7. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 8. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 0. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q4. IN WHAT STATE OF THE UNITED STATES DID YOU SPEND MOST OF THE LAST FIVE YEARS OF YOUR CIVILIAN LIFE BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARM? E. SECTION:  01. NEW ENGLAND 02. MIDDLE ATLANTIC 03. EAST NORTH CENTRAL 04. WEST NORTH CENTRAL 05. SOUTH ATLANTIC 06. EAST SOUTH CENTRAL 07. WEST SOUTH CENTRAL 08. MOUNTAIN 09. PACIFIC 10. FOREIGN - U.S. POSSESSION 11. FOREIGN - NOT U.S. 12. U.S. - STATE NOT SPECIFIED 00. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q5. WHERE WERE YOU LIVING MOST OF THE LAST FIVE YEARS OF YOUR CIVILIAN LIFE BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARM?  1. ON A FARM OR IN THE COUNTRY 2. IN A SMALL TOWN (FEWER THAN 2,500 PEOPLE) 3. IN A TOWN (WITH BETWEEN 2,500 AND 25,000 PEOPLE) 4. IN A CITY (BETWEEN 25,000 AND 100,000 PEOPLE) 5. IN A LARGE CITY (MORE THAN 100,000 PEOPLE) 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTIONS 6 AND 7 TO BE CODED TOGETHER.

S063E.Q6. ARE YOU SINGLE, MARRIED, DIVORCED OR SEPARATED, OR WIDOWE? F. IF MARRIED:  Q.7. WERE YOU MARRIED BEFORE OR AFTER ENTERING THE ARM?  1. SINGLE 2. DIVORCED OR SEPARATED 3. WIDOWED 4. MARRIED BEFORE ENTERING THE ARMY 5. MARRIED AFTER ENTERING THE ARMY 0. NO ANSWER
S063E.Q8. HOW MANY CHILDREN DO YOU HAV?  1. HAVE ONE CHILD 2. HAVE TWO CHILDREN 3. HAVE THREE OR MORE CHILDREN 4. I HAVE NO CHILDREN 5. I'M NOT MARRIED 0. NO ANSWER
S063E.Q9. IS YOUR WIFE NOW EXPECTING A BAB?  1. YES 2. NO 3. I'M NOT MARRIED 0. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q10. HOW DID YOU COME INTO THE ARM?  1. I WAS DRAFTED 2. I VOLUNTEERED 3. I WAS IN THE NATIONAL GUARD 4. ENLISTED RESERVE CORPS (ERC), REGULAR ARMY RESERVE (RAR), RESERVE OFFICER TRAINING CORPS (ROTC) 0. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q11. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE ARM? E. IF YOU HAVE BEEN IN THE ARMY BEFORE, THEN WERE OUT FOR A WHILE, JUST CHECK THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOU ENTERED THIS LAST TIME. IF YOU WERE IN THE NATIONAL GUARD, CHECK THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOUR OUTFIT CAME INTO THE ARMY.  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 9 MONTHS 4. OVER 9 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 5. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 6. OVER 2 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q12. HAS THE ARMY CLASSIFIED YOU AS A LIMITED SERVICE MA?  1. YES, THE ARMY HAS CLASSIFIED ME AS LIMITED SERVICE 2. NO, THE ARMY HAS NOT CLASSIFIED ME AS LIMITED SERVICE 3. I DON'T KNOW WHETHER THE ARMY HAS CLASSIFIED ME AS LIMITED SERVICE OR NOT 0. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q13. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE CAMP WHERE YOU ARE NOW STATIONE?  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 9 MONTHS 4. OVER 9 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 5. OVER 1 YEAR 0. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q14. WHAT BRANCH OF THE ARMY ARE YOU IN NO?  01. ENGINEERS 02. FIELD ARTILLERY 03. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 04. INFANTRY 05. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 06. ARMORED FORCE 07. SIGNAL CORPS 08. COAST ARTILLERY AND ANTI-AIRCRAFT 09. AIR CORPS 10. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 11. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 12. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 13. MILITARY POLICE 14. CAVALRY 15. FINANCE 16. OTHER 00. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q15. IF YOU HAD A CHOICE, WHICH ONE OF THESE BRANCHES OF THE ARMY WOULD YOU LIKE TO BE I?  01. ENGINEERS 02. FIELD ARTILLERY 03. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 04. INFANTRY 05. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 06. ARMORED FORCE 07. SIGNAL CORPS 08. COAST ARTILLERY AND ANTI-AIRCRAFT 09. AIR CORPS 10. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 11. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 12. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 13. MILITARY POLICE 14. CAVALRY 15. FINANCE 16. OTHER 00. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q16. ABOUT HOW OFTEN DO YOU GO TO ANY TOWN OR CITY SINCE YOU'VE BEEN IN THIS CAM?  1. ONCE EVERY 2 OR 3 WEEKS 2. ONCE A WEEK 3. TWICE A WEEK 4. THREE OR MORE TIMES A WEEK 5. LESS THAN ONCE A MONTH 6. ONCE A MONTH 7. NEVER 8. I LIVE OFF THE POST IN A TOWN OR CITY 0. NO ANSWER
S063E.Q17. DO YOU FEEL PROUD OF YOUR COMPANY (BATTERY, SQUADRON, TROOP)*  1. YES, VERY PROUD 2. YES, FAIRLY PROUD 3. NO, NOT PROUD 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S063E.Q18. HOW INTERESTED ARE YOU IN YOUR ARMY JO?  1. VERY MUCH INTERESTED 2. A LITTLE BUT NOT MUCH 3. NOT INTERESTED AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S063E.Q19. WOULD YOU CHANGE TO SOME OTHER ARMY JOB IF GIVEN A CHANC?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S063E.Q20. DO YOU USUALLY FEEL THAT WHAT YOU ARE DOING IN THE ARMY IS WORTHWHILE OR NO?  1. I USUALLY FEEL IT IS WORTHWHILE 2. I USUALLY FEEL IT IS NOT WORTHWHILE 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S063E.Q21. DO YOU THINK YOU CAN MAKE GOOD IN THE ARM?  1. I FEEL PRETTY SURE I CAN MAKE GOOD 2. I AM NOT SO SURE I CAN MAKE GOOD 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S063E.Q22. IN GENERAL, WHAT SORT OF A TIME DO YOU HAVE IN THE ARM?  1. I HAVE A PRETTY GOOD TIME 2. IT'S ABOUT FIFTY-FIFTY 3. I HAVE A PRETTY ROTTEN TIME 0. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q23. IN GENERAL, HOW WOULD YOU SAY YOU FEEL MOST OF THE TIME, IN GOOD SPIRITS OR IN LOW SPIRIT?  1. I AM USUALLY IN GOOD SPIRITS 2. I AM IN GOOD SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME AND IN LOW SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME 3. I AM USUALLY IN LOW SPIRITS 0. NO ANSWER
S063E.Q24. ARE YOU EVER WORRIED AND UPSE?  1. I AM HARDLY EVER WORRIED AND UPSET 2. I AM SOMETIMES WORRIED AND UPSET 3. I AM OFTEN WORRIED AND UPSET 0. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q25. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU, WHAT KIND OF OUTFIT WOULD YOU RATHER BE I?  1. IN A COMBAT OUTFIT OVERSEAS 2. IN A NON-COMBAT OUTFIT OVERSEAS 3. IN AN OUTFIT THAT WILL STAY IN THE UNITED STATES 0. NO ANSWER
S063E.Q26. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU TO CHOOSE, DO YOU THINK YOU COULD DO MORE FOR YOUR COUNTRY AS A SOLDIER OR AS A WORKER IN A WAR JO?  1. AS A SOLDIER 2. AS A WAR WORKER 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q27. HOW SATISFIED ARE YOU ABOUT BEING IN YOUR PRESENT ARMY JOB INSTEAD OF SOME OTHER ARMY JO?  1. VERY SATISFIED 2. SATISFIED 3. VERY DISSATISFIED 4. DISSATISFIED 5. IT DOES NOT MAKE ANY DIFFERENCE TO ME 0. NO ANSWER
S063E.Q28. DO YOU FEEL THAT EVERYTHING POSSIBLE HAS BEEN DONE TO PLACE YOU IN THE ARMY JOB WERE YOU BEST FI?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q29. DO YOU CONSIDER YOUR OWN PRESENT JOB OR DUTY IN THE ARMY AN IMPORTANT ONE IN THE WAR EFFOR?  1. VERY IMPORTANT 2. PRETTY IMPORTANT 3. NOT SO IMPORTANT 4. NOT IMPORTANT AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q30. ON THE WHOLE, DO YOU THINK THE ARMY IS GIVING YOU A CHANCE TO SHOW WHAT YOU CAN D?  1. A VERY GOOD CHANCE 2. A FAIRLY GOOD CHANCE 3. NOT MUCH OF A CHANCE 4. NO CHANCE AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q31. DO YOU THINK A SOLDIER WITH ABILITY HAS A GOOD CHANCE FOR PROMOTION IN THE ARM?  1. A VERY GOOD CHANCE 2. A FAIRLY GOOD CHANCE 3. NOT MUCH OF A CHANCE 4. NO CHANCE AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q32. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT ARMY FOO?  1. IT IS GOOD QUALITY AND WELL PREPARED 2. IT IS GOOD QUALITY, BUT POORLY PREPARED 3. IT IS POOR QUALITY, BUT WELL PREPARED 4. IT IS POOR QUALITY AND POORLY PREPARED 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S063E.Q33. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT MEDICAL ATTENTION IN THE ARM?  1. IT IS VERY GOOD 2. IT IS FAIRLY GOOD 3. IT IS VERY POOR 4. IT IS RATHER POOR 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q34. DO YOU EVER FEEL THAT YOU ARE NOT AS GOOD A SOLDIER AS MOST OF THE OTHER MEN IN YOUR OUTFI?  1. I FEEL THAT WAY NEARLY ALL OF THE TIME 2. I FEEL THAT WAY FAIRLY OFTEN 3. I FEEL THAT WAY ONLY ONCE IN A WHILE 4. I ALMOST NEVER FEEL THAT WAY 0. NO ANSWER
S063E.Q35. IN GENERAL, HOW WOULD YOU SAY YOUR HEALTH I?  1. BETTER THAN MOST MEN 2. ABOUT THE SAME AS MOST MEN 3. NOT AS GOOD AS MOST MEN 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S063E.Q36. IF YOU WERE SENT INTO ACTUAL FIGHTING RIGHT NOW, HOW DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD D?  1. I THINK I WOULD DO ALL RIGHT 2. I THINK I WOULD HAVE TROUBLE AT FIRST, BUT AFTER A WHILE I WOULD BE O.K. 3. I DON'T THINK I WOULD DO VERY WELL 4. I HAVEN'T ANY IDEA HOW I WOULD DO 0. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q37. WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING STATEMENTS BEST TELLS THE WAY YOU FEEL ABOUT GETTING INTO THE FIGHTIN? X. CODES 1-4 PRECODED ON QUESTIONNAIRE, OTHER RESPONSES VOLUNTEERED.  01. I'M READY TO GO AND I WANT TO GET INTO THE REAL FIGHTING SOON 02. I'D LIKE TO GET IN ON THE FIGHTING BEFORE IT'S OVER BUT I DON'T THINK I'M READY YET 03. I HOPE I WON'T HAVE TO GO, BUT IF I DO, I THINK I'LL DO ALL RIGHT 04. I HOPE I WON'T HAVE TO GO BECAUSE I DON'T THINK I'LL EVER BE GOOD AS A FIGHTER 05. TOO OLD FOR COMBAT DUTY 06. NOT PHYSICALLY FIT FOR COMBAT DUTY 07. SHOULD BE IN WAR INDUSTRY OR ON FARM 08. CHECKS #1 BUT QUALIFIES BY ASKING FOR FURLOUGH, WIFE'S PERMISSION, ETC. 09. WOULD PREFER TO BE INSTRUCTOR 10. OTHER COMMENTS INDICATING THAT MAN DOES NOT WISH COMBAT 11. ALL OTHER 00. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q38. IF YOU WERE GOING TO BE SENT OVERSEAS WITH A COMBAT UNIT, WOULD YOU RATHER BE SENT TO FIGHT THE GERMANS OR WOULD YOU RATHER BE SENT TO FIGHT THE JAPANES?  1. I WOULD RATHER BE SENT TO FIGHT THE GERMANS 2. I WOULD RATHER BE SENT TO FIGHT THE JAPANESE 3. IT WOULD NOT MAKE ANY DIFFERENCE TO ME 0. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q39. ABOUT HOW MUCH LONGER FROM NOW DO YOU GUESS THE WAR WILL LAST WITH GERMAN?  01. LESS THAN A YEAR, OR JUST 1943, OR A TIME NAMED BETWEEN AUGUST 1943, AND JUNE 1944 02. ONE YEAR (JULY, 1944) 03. OVER ONE YEAR BUT LESS THAN TWO, OR A TIME NAMED BETWEEN AUGUST 1944 AND JUNE 1945 04. TWO YEARS (JULY, 1945) 05. OVER TWO YEARS BUT LESS THAN THREE, OR A TIME NAMED BETWEEN AUGUST 1945, AND JUNE 1946 06. THREE YEARS (JULY, 1946) 07. OVER THREE YEARS 08. INDEFINITE ANSWER INDICATING A SHORT TIME - E.G. "NOT LONG" 09. INDEFINITE ANSWER INDICATING A LONG TIME - E.G. "SEVERAL YEARS YET" 10. INDEFINITE ANSWER WITH NO INDICATION OF TIME - E.G. "WILL LAST UNTIL WE STOP IT" 11. DON'T KNOW, UNDECIDED 00. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q40. WHICH COMES CLOSEST TO YOUR IDEA OF HOW HARD IT IS GOING TO BE TO BEAT THE GERMAN?  1. IT WILL NOT BE VERY HARD 2. IT WILL BE A TOUGH JOB BUT OUR LOSSES WON'T BE TOO HEAVY 3. IT WILL BE A TOUGH JOB, WITH HEAVY LOSSES OF MEN AND EQUIPMENT 0. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q41. ABOUT HOW MUCH LONGER FROM NOW DO YOU GUESS THE WAR WILL LAST WITH JAPA?  01. LESS THAN A YEAR, OR JUST 1943, OR A TIME NAMED BETWEEN AUGUST 1943, AND JUNE 1944 02. ONE YEAR (JULY, 1944) 03. OVER ONE YEAR BUT LESS THAN TWO, OR A TIME NAMED BETWEEN AUGUST 1944 AND JUNE 1945 04. TWO YEARS (JULY, 1945) 05. OVER TWO YEARS BUT LESS THAN THREE, OR A TIME NAMED BETWEEN AUGUST 1945, AND JUNE 1946 06. THREE YEARS (JULY, 1946) 07. OVER THREE YEARS 08. INDEFINITE ANSWER INDICATING A SHORT TIME - E.G. "NOT LONG" 09. INDEFINITE ANSWER INDICATING A LONG TIME - E.G. "SEVERAL YEARS YET" 10. INDEFINITE ANSWER WITH NO INDICATION OF TIME - E.G. "WILL LAST UNTIL WE STOP IT" 11. DON'T KNOW, UNDECIDED 00. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q42. WHICH COMES CLOSEST TO YOUR IDEA OF HOW HARD IT IS GOING TO BE TO BEAT THE JAPANES?  1. IT WILL NOT BE VERY HARD 2. IT WILL BE A TOUGH JOB BUT OUR LOSSES WON'T BE TOO HEAVY 3. IT WILL BE A TOUGH JOB, WITH HEAVY LOSSES OF MEN AND EQUIPMENT 0. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q43. HOW DO YOU THINK THIS WAR WILL COME OUT FOR THE ALLIE?  1. IT WILL BE A COMPLETE MILITARY VICTORY FOR US 2. WE WILL WIN, BUT IT WON'T BE A COMPLETE MILITARY VICTORY 3. IT WILL END IN A DRAW 4. THE OTHER SIDE HAS A PRETTY GOOD CHANCE OF WINNING 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q44. IF THE GERMANS WERE TO OFFER TO STOP FIGHTING NOW AND TO GIVE UP ALL THE COUNTRIES AND TERRITORY THEY HAVE TAKEN OVER, WHAT DO YOU THINK WE SHOULD D?  1. WE SHOULD ACCEPT THE OFFER AND STOP FIGHTING NOW 2. WE SHOULD CONSIDER THE OFFER AND TRY TO WORK OUT SOME PEACE TERMS WITH THEM 3. WE SHOULD TURN DOWN THE OFFER AND KEEP ON FIGHTING UNTIL THEY GIVE UP COMPLETELY 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q45. IF THE JAPANESE WERE TO OFFER TO STOP FIGHTING NOW AND TO GIVE UP ALL THE COUNTRIES AND TERRITORY THEY HAVE TAKEN OVER, WHAT DO YOU THINK WE SHOULD D?  1. WE SHOULD ACCEPT THE OFFER AND STOP FIGHTING NOW 2. WE SHOULD CONSIDER THE OFFER AND TRY TO WORK OUT SOME PEACE TERMS WITH THEM 3. WE SHOULD TURN DOWN THE OFFER AND KEEP ON FIGHTING UNTIL THEY GIVE UP COMPLETELY 4. UNDECIDED 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S063E.Q46. WHICH DO YOU THINK ARE THE MOST DANGEROUS TO FIGHT AGAINST, THE GERMANS OR THE JAPANES?  1. THE GERMANS ARE THE MOST DANGEROUS TO FIGHT AGAINST 2. THE JAPANESE ARE THE MOST DANGEROUS TO FIGHT AGAINST 3. THEY ARE ABOUT THE SAME 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q47. WOULD YOU SAY THAT MOST OF THE MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT USUALLY PUT ALL THEY HAVE INTO THEIR ARMY TRAINING AND REGULAR DUTIES, OR DO THEY USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET B?  1. MOST OF THE MEN USUALLY PUT ALL THEY HAVE INTO IT 2. MOST OF THE MEN USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET BY 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q48. HOW ABOUT YOU YOURSELF - WOULD YOU HONESTLY SAY THAT YOU USUALLY PUT ALL YOU HAVE INTO YOUR ARMY TRAINING AND REGULAR DUTIES, OR DO YOU USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET B?  1. I USUALLY PUT ALL I HAVE INTO IT 2. I USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET BY 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q49. WHEN SOMETHING HAPPENS SO THAT YOUR OUTFIT HAS TO WORK OVERTIME, WHAT DO MOST OF THE MEN USUALLY D?  1. MOST OF THE MEN USUALLY PUT ALL THEY HAVE INTO IT 2. MOST OF THE MEN USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET BY 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S063E.Q50. HOW ABOUT YOU YOURSELF - WHEN SOMETHING HAPPENS SO THAT YOU HAVE TO WORK OVERTIME WHAT DO YOU USUALLY D?  1. I USUALLY PUT ALL I HAVE INTO IT 2. I USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET BY 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S063E.Q51. WHEN YOU GET A VERY IMPORTANT JOB TO DO, DO YOU WORRY ABOUT WHETHER YOU WILL DO ALL RIGHT OR NO?  1. I WORRY A LOT 2. I WORRY A LITTLE 3. I DON'T WORRY AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q52. SUPPOSE YOU WERE WORKING AT YOUR REGULAR ARMY JOB AND A GENERAL YOU HAD NEVER SEEN BEFORE CAME UP AND ASKED YOU QUESTIONS ABOUT WHAT YOU WERE DOING. DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD MAKE A GOOD IMPRESSION ON HI?  1. I'M PRETTY SURE I WOULD MAKE A GOOD IMPRESSION ON HIM 2. I'M NOT SURE, BUT I THINK I WOULD MAKE A GOOD IMPRESSION ON HIM 3. I DON'T THINK I WOULD MAKE SUCH A GOOD IMPRESSION ON HIM 0. NO ANSWER
S063E.Q53. DO YOU THINK THERE WILL BE ANOTHER WAR IN THE NEXT 25 YEARS OR S?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q54A. DO YOU THINK THAT AFTER THE WAR SOLDIERS IN YOUR OUTFIT WILL FIND IT EASIER OR HARDER TO GET JOBS THAN THEY DID BEFORE THE WA?  1. EASIER THAN BEFORE THE WAR 2. ABOUT THE SAME AS BEFORE THE WAR 3. HARDER THAN BEFORE THE WAR 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 54B NOT CODED.

S063E.Q55. UP TO NOW, HAS THE WAR MADE THINGS BETTER OR WORSE FOR YOUR FAMIY AND FRIENDS BACK HOME (SUCH THINGS AS JOBS, PAY, AND LIVING CONDITIONS)*  1. THINGS ARE A LOT BETTER 2. THINGS ARE A LITTLE BETTER 3. THINGS ARE A LOT WORSE 4. THINGS ARE A LITTLE WORSE 5. I DON'T SEE ANY DIFFERENCE 6. DON'T KNOW 7. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S063E.Q56. HOW IMPORTANT IS IT TO YOU PERSONALLY TO BE ABLE TO GET THE NEWS OF THE DAY WHILE YOU ARE IN THE ARM?  1. IT IS ABSOLUTELY NECESSARY 2. IT IS OF GREAT IMPORTANCE 3. IT IS OF MEDIUM IMPORTANCE 4. IT IS OF LITTLE IMPORTANCE 5. IT IS OF NO IMPORTANCE AT ALL 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S063E.Q57. DO YOU THINK THE PROBLEMS THIS COUNTRY WILL HAVE AFTER THE WAR ARE GETTING TOO MUCH OR TOO LITTLE ATTENTION AT THE PRESENT TIM?  1. THEY ARE GETTING TOO MUCH ATTENTION NOW 2. THEY ARE GETTING ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT OF ATTENTION NOW 3. THEY ARE GETTING TOO LITTLE ATTENTNION NOW 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q58. HOW IMPORTANT IS IT TO YOU PERSONALLY TO HAVE A CLEAR UNDERSTANDING OF WHY WE ARE FIGHTING THIS WA?  1. IT IS ABSOLUTELY NECESSARY 2. IT IS OF GREAT IMPORTANCE 3. IT IS OF MEDIUM IMPORTANCE 4. IT IS OF LITTLE IMPORTANCE 5. IT IS OF NO IMPORTANCE AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q59. HOW INTERESTED ARE YOU IN DISCUSSIONS ABOUT WHAT THE WORLD WILL BE LIKE AFTER THE WA?  1. VERY MUCH INTERESTED 2. QUITE INTERESTED 3. NOT MUCH INTERESTED 4. NOT INTERESTED AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q60. HOW INTERESTED WOULD YOU BE IN LEARNING MORE ABOUT HOW PEOPLE LIVE UNDER FASCISM AND NAZIS?  1. VERY MUCH INTERESTED 2. QUITE INTERESTED 3. NOT MUCH INTERESTED 4. NOT INTERESTED AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q61. HOW INTERESTED WOULD YOU BE IN LEARNING MORE ABOUT HOW PEOPLE LIVE UNDER THE RUSSIAN SYSTEM OF GOVERNMEN?  1. VERY MUCH INTERESTED 2. QUITE INTERESTED 3. NOT MUCH INTERESTED 4. NOT INTERESTED AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q62. HOW INTERESTED WOULD YOU BE IN LEARNING MORE ABOUT HOW PEOPLE LIVE IN CHIN?  1. VERY MUCH INTERESTED 2. QUITE INTERESTED 3. NOT MUCH INTERESTED 4. NOT INTERESTED AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTIONS 63 AND 64 NOT CODED.
S063E.Q65. IN YOUR OPINION IS THE UNITED STATES FIGHTING FOR THINGS THAT YOU FEEL ARE WORTH FIGHTING FO?  1. YES 2. NO 3. I THINK SO, BUT I'M NOT SURE 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

IT WOULD MAKE QUITE A BIT OF DIFFERENCE TO ME 3. IT WOULD NOT MAKE SO MUCH DIFFERENCE TO ME 4. IT WOULD NOT MAKE ANY DIFFERENCE TO ME 0. NO ANSWER X. COL. 80 NOT USED. CARD 2

S063E.Q67. DO YOU EVER GET THE FEELING THAT THIS WAR IS NOT WORTH FIGHTIN?  1. VERY OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ONLY ONCE IN A GREAT WHILE 4. NEVER 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S063E.Q68. DO YOU THINK THE THINGS WE ARE FIGHTING FOR ARE WORTH RISKING YOU LIFE FO?  1. YES 2. NO 3. I THINK SO, BUT I'M NOT SURE 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q69A. DO YOU THINK THE WAR WILL CAUSE ANY REAL AND LASTING CHANGES IN THE UNITED STATE?  1. THERE WILL BE A LOT OF CHANGES 2. THERE WILL BE SOME CHANGES 3. THERE WILL BE HARDLY ANY CHANGES 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 69B NOT CODED.

S063E.Q70A. AFTER THE WAR, DO YOU THINK WE OUGHT TO HAVE EVERYTHING IN THIS COUNTRY THE SAME AS IT WAS BEFORE THE WAR OR DO YOU THINK THERE ARE SOME THINGS THAT SHOULD BE CHANGE?  1. A LOT OF THINGS SHOULD BE CHANGED 2. SOME THINGS SHOULD BE CHANGED 3. HARDLY ANYTHING SHOULD BE CHANGED 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 70B NOT CODED.

S063E.Q71. AFTER THE WAR IS OVER, DO YOU THINK THE UNITED STATES WILL BE A BETTER PLACE OR A WORSE PLACE TO LIVE IN THAN IT WAS BEFORE THE WA?  1. BETTER AFTER THE WAR THAN BEFORE THE WAR 2. SAME AFTER THE WAR AS BEFORE THE WAR 3. WORSE AFTER THE WAR THAN BEFORE THE WAR 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S063E.Q72A. "AFTER THE WAR THE UNITED STATES SHOULD CONTROL AND DOMINATE THE WORLD*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 3. AGREE MODIFIED 4. DISAGREE MODIFIED 5. AGREE AND DISAGREE CIRCLED, UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q72B. "AFTER THE WAR THE UNITED STATES SHOULD STAY OUT OF WORLD AFFAIRS AND STICK TO THE PROBLEMS WE HAVE IN THIS COUNTRY*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 3. AGREE MODIFIED 4. DISAGREE MODIFIED 5. AGREE AND DISAGREE CIRCLED, UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q72C. "AFTER THE WAR THE NATIONS OF THE WORLD SHOULD SET UP A STRONG ORGANIZATION WITH AN INTERNATIONAL ARMY TO POLICE THE WORLD*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 3. AGREE MODIFIED 4. DISAGREE MODIFIED 5. AGREE AND DISAGREE CIRCLED, UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q73D. "AFTER THE WAR THE UNITED STATES SHOULD JOIN A STRONG ORGANIZATION OF NATIONS EVEN IF IT MEANT THAT THIS ORGANIZATION WOULD HAVE SOME CONTROL OVER HOW THE UNITED STATES DEALS WITH OTHER COUNTRIES*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 3. AGREE MODIFIED 4. DISAGREE MODIFIED 5. AGREE AND DISAGREE CIRCLED, UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q73. WHICH DO YOU THINK WOULD BE THE BEST WAY FOR THE UNITED STATES TO KEEP OUT OF WAR IN THE FUTUR?  1. STAY OUT OF WORLD AFFAIRS 2. JOIN A STRONG ORGANIZATION OF NATIONS 3. SOME OTHER WAY, PLAN MENTIONED 4. SOME OTHER WAY, NO PLAN MENTIONED 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S063E.Q74. WHEN THE WAR IS OVER DO YOU THINK THE ARMY SHOULD RELEASE ALL SOLDIERS BACK TO CIVILIAN LIFE AS SOON AS POSSIBLE OR SHOULD IT RELEASE THEM ONLY WHEN THERE ARE JOBS FOR THE?  1. RELEASE MEN ONLY WHEN THERE ARE JOBS FOR THEM 2. RELEASE MEN AS SOON AS POSSIBLE WHETHER THERE ARE JOBS FOR THEM OR NOT 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S063E.Q75A. AFTER THE WAR WHEN THE ARMY STARTS RELEASING SOLDIERS BACK TO CIVILIAN LIFE, WHICH OF THESE TWO GROUPS OF MEN DO YOU THINK SHOULD BE RELEASED FIRS?  1. MEN WITH DEPENDENTS 2. MEN OVER THIRTY YEARS OF AGE 0. NO ANSWER
S063E.Q75B. WHICH OF THESE TWO GROUPS OF MEN DO YOU THINK SHOULD BE RELEASED FIRS?  1. MEN WHO HAVE BEEN IN THE ARMY LONGEST 2. MEN WITH DEPENDENTS 0. NO ANSWER
